title: @Meddler Clarification on the bonus range added on Nasus' Q
body: Does he gain the increased range upon activating siphoning strike or after using it, granting him the bonus range on his next attack?

replies.body: The bonus range is for the empowered strike.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mwz6AviA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-05T06:38:03.235+0000)
>
> The bonus range is for the empowered strike.

Basicaly making it more difficult to get away from him haha thats cool.

While we're at it, can he not have a permanent slow? with 40% crd and the length of the slow, he can permanently keep someone forever slowed even with tenactiy. At the very least make it so that the slow decays over time instead of increases over time..
Let's also make him teleport with his ultimate when right-clicking on targets.
